004package main;
005
006import java.util.ArrayList;
007import java.util.Arrays;
008import mkt.Model;
009import mkt.Models;
010import kut.*;
011import main.Cts;
012import main.Log;
013import data.Vals;
014import data.Ival;
015
016/** Data base management. */
017public class Db {
018  private Db(){};
019
020  /**
021  Initializes data base. <p>
022  NOTE: For add new models use commented code and calling 'MarketModelsJ init'.
023  */
024  public static void init () {
025    if (!File.exists(Cts.dataPath)) {
026      File.mkdir(Cts.resultsDir);
027      File.write(Path.cat(Cts.dataPath, "version.txt"), Cts.dataVersion);
028      for (Model md : Models.list()) {
029        String mdPath = Path.cat(Cts.resultsDir, md.id);
030        for (String pr : Cts.periods)
031          for (String tp : Cts.types)
032            File.mkdir(Path.cat(mdPath, pr, tp));
033      }
034      Log.reset();
035      return;
036    }
037
038/*
039        String mdPath = Path.cat(Cts.resultsDir, "SSBB2");
040        for (String pr : Cts.periods)
041          for (String tp : Cts.types)
042            File.mkdir(Path.cat(mdPath, pr, tp));
043*/
044
045    throw new RuntimeException("Data base already initialized");
046  };
047
048  /**
049  Returns dates for ranking.
050  @param period One of Cts.periods.
051  @return Ditto.
052  */
053  public static ArrayList<String> rankDates (String period) {
054    ArrayList<String> baseDates = Arr.mk(File.dir(Path.cat(
055      Cts.resultsDir, Cts.modelBase, period, "prices"
056    )));
057    Arr.sort(baseDates, (d1, d2) -> d1.compareTo(d2) > 0);
058    return Arr.take(baseDates, Cts.globalRanks);
059  };
060
061  /**
062  Returns normalized results of a directory.<p>
063  If results can not be read, returns 'r.date = ""' and  'r.Vals = []'
064  @param mdId   Model identifier.
065  @param period One of 'Cts.Periods'.
066  @param type One of 'cts.Types'.
067  @param start  Index of the first date to return values.
068  @param len    Number of dates to return values. NOTE: It can be returned less
069                values if there is some error.
070  @return Ditto.
071  */
072  public static Vals readResults(
073    String mdId, String period, String type, int start, int len
074  ) {
075    ArrayList<String> baseDates = Arr.mk(File.dir(Path.cat(
076      Cts.resultsDir, Cts.modelBase, period, type
077    )));
078    if (baseDates.size() <= start) return new Vals("", new ArrayList<>());
079
080    Arr.sort(baseDates, (d1, d2) -> d1.compareTo(d2) > 0);
081    ArrayList<String> rqDates = Arr.take(Arr.drop(baseDates, start), len);
082
083    String dir = Path.cat(Cts.resultsDir, mdId, period, type);
084
085    String date = rqDates.get(0);
086    if (!File.exists(Path.cat(dir, date))) return new Vals("", new ArrayList<>());
087
088    ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> vals = new ArrayList<>();
089    ArrayList<String> errs = new ArrayList<>();
090    for (String d : rqDates) {
091      String fpath = Path.cat(dir, d);
092      if (File.exists(fpath))
093        vals.add(Arr.map(Js.ra(File.read(fpath)), Js::ri));
094      else {
095        errs.add("Date missing " + d);
096      }
097    }
098
099    if (errs.size() > 0) {
100      Log.error(
101        "Reading results of " + mdId + "-" + period + "-" + type + ":\n" +
102        Arr.join(Arr.map(errs, (e) -> "  - " + e), "\n")
103      );
104    }
105    return new Vals(date, vals);
106  }
107
108  /**
109  Returns best value for global ranking.<p>
110  When 'stats=="deviation"' 'r.ix == 0', because r.val is an average.<p>
111  If the function fails, returns 'Opt.none()'.
112  @param mdId   Model identifier.
113  @param period Period index (one of 'Cts.Periods').
114  @param type Value types index (one of 'cts.Types').
115  @param idate  date index (first is 0).
116  @param stats  One of Cts.stats.
117  @return Ditto.
118  */
119  public static Opt<Ival> rankValue (
120    String mdId, String period, String type, int idate, String stats
121  ) {
122    int len = stats.equals("price") ? 1 : Cts.statDates;
123    Vals rs = readResults(mdId, period, type, idate, len);
124    ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> vals = rs.vals;
125    if (vals.size() == 0) return Opt.none();
126
127    if (stats.equals("deviation")) {
128      ArrayList<Integer> vs = main.Fns.stats("deviation", vals);
129      return Opt.some(new Ival(0, vs.get(0)));
130    }
131    ArrayList<Integer> vs = stats.equals("price")
132      ? vals.get(0)
133      : main.Fns.stats(stats, vals)
134    ;
135    int inv = 0;
136    int val = vs.get(0);
137    for (int i = 0; i < vs.size(); ++i) {
138      int v = vs.get(i);
139      if (v > val) {
140        inv = i;
141        val = v;
142      }
143    }
144    return Opt.some(new Ival(inv, val));
145  };
146
147  static int weekInYear (String d) {
148    long tm = Time.fromStr(d).getValue();
149    long day1 = Time.mk(1, 1, Time.year(tm));
150    int wdEn = Time.weekday(day1);
151    int wd = wdEn == 0 ? 6 : wdEn - 1;
152    int dfDays = Time.dfDays(tm, day1);
153    return (dfDays + wd) / 7;
154  }
155
156  /**
157  Updates data base.
158  @param mdId   Model intentifier.
159  @param date   Last date of data.
160  @param prices Assets by prices.
161  @param accs   Assets by accounting.
162  @param refs   Assets by references.*/
163  /// \s, s, [i.], [i.], [i.] -> ()
164  public static void update (
165    String mdId, String date, int[] prices, int[] accs, int[] refs
166  ) {
167    String modelPath = Path.cat(Cts.resultsDir, mdId);
168    for (String tp : Cts.types) {
169      String data;
170      if (tp.equals("prices")) data = Js.w(Arr.map(Arr.mk(prices), Js::w));
171      else if (tp.equals("accs")) data = Js.w(Arr.map(Arr.mk(accs), Js::w));
172      else data = Js.w(Arr.map(Arr.mk(refs), Js::w));
173
174      File.write(Path.cat(modelPath, Cts.periods[0], tp, date), data);
175
176      String wPath = Path.cat(modelPath, Cts.periods[1], tp);
177      String[] wdates = File.dir(wPath);
178      if (wdates.length > 0) {
179        Arrays.sort(wdates);
180        String lastDate = wdates[wdates.length - 1];
181        if (lastDate.equals(date) || weekInYear(lastDate) != weekInYear(date))
182          File.write(Path.cat(wPath, date), data);
183      } else {
184        File.write(Path.cat(wPath, date), data);
185      }
186
187      String mPath = Path.cat(modelPath, Cts.periods[2], tp);
188      String[] mdates = File.dir(mPath);
189      if (mdates.length > 0) {
190        Arrays.sort(mdates);
191        String lastDate = mdates[mdates.length - 1];
192        if (
193          lastDate.equals(date) ||
194          !Str.left(lastDate, 6).equals(Str.left(date, 6))
195        )
196          File.write(Path.cat(mPath, date), data);
197      } else {
198        File.write(Path.cat(mPath, date), data);
199      }
200    }
201  }
202}
